context: Biotechnology company developing novel gene therapy platform needs comprehensive IP protection strategy across multiple jurisdictions

request.purpose: Multi-year IP protection strategy including patent filings, licensing agreements, and defensive publications
request.justification: Gene therapy platform represents $2B market opportunity; strong IP position critical for partnerships and market leadership

decision_process.outcome: Identified 15 core patent families and 8 licensing opportunities
Developed comprehensive IP strategy balancing protection with commercialization
Clear pathway for patent protection in key markets (US, EU, China, Japan)
Projected 300% ROI over 10 years with strong defensive positioning
Approved comprehensive IP protection strategy with phased implementation

business_impact.expected_outcome: Secure IP leadership in gene therapy space enabling premium partnerships and market dominance

lessons_learned: Early defensive publications prevented competitor blocking patents; international filing strategy critical for global protection
